data.title: Luke Ridnour Player Profile, Toronto Raptors
data.meta_description: Get the latest news, stats and more about Luke Ridnour on RealGM.com
data.text: Jun 26, 2003 - The Seattle SuperSonics selected Luke Ridnour in Round 1 with Pick 14 in the 2003 NBA Draft. Jul 8, 2003 - Luke Ridnour signed a multi-year contract with the Seattle SuperSonics. Oct 6, 2005 - The Seattle SuperSonics exercised their Team Option to extend the contract of Luke Ridnour. Oct 30, 2006 - Luke Ridnour signed a rookie scale extension with the Seattle SuperSonics. Aug 13, 2008 - Luke Ridnour was acquired by the Milwaukee Bucks, along with Adrian Griffin, Damon Jones and a TPE, from the Oklahoma City Thunder in exchange for Desmond Mason and Mo Williams. Jul 1, 2010 - Luke Ridnour, previously with the Milwaukee Bucks, became a free agent. Jul 21, 2010 - Luke Ridnour signed a multi-year contract with the Minnesota Timberwolves. Jul 11, 2013 - Luke Ridnour was acquired by the Milwaukee Bucks, along with a 2014 2nd round pick (LAL own) and cash, from the Minnesota Timberwolves in exchange for the draft rights to Szymon Szewczyk. Feb 20, 2014 - Luke Ridnour was acquired by the Charlotte Hornets, along with Gary Neal and a TPE, from the Milwaukee Bucks in exchange for Jeff Adrien and Ramon Sessions. Jul 1, 2014 - Luke Ridnour, previously with the Charlotte Hornets, became a free agent. Jul 10, 2014 - The Charlotte Hornets renounced their free-agent exception rights to Luke Ridnour. Jul 25, 2014 - Luke Ridnour signed a multi-year contract with the Orlando Magic. Jun 24, 2015 - Luke Ridnour was acquired by the Memphis Grizzlies from the Orlando Magic in exchange for the draft rights to Janis Timma and a TPE. Jun 25, 2015 - Luke Ridnour was acquired by the Charlotte Hornets, along with a TPE, from the Memphis Grizzlies in exchange for Matt Barnes. Jun 25, 2015 - Luke Ridnour was acquired by the Oklahoma City Thunder, along with a conditional 2016 2nd round pick (CHA own), from the Charlotte Hornets in exchange for Jeremy Lamb. Jun 30, 2015 - Luke Ridnour was acquired by the Toronto Raptors, along with cash, from the Oklahoma City Thunder in exchange for the draft rights to Tomislav Zubcic and a TPE. Jul 9, 2015 - The Toronto Raptors placed the contract of Luke Ridnour on waivers.
